Reading's favourite Chinese restaurant

Welcome to Kungfu Kitchen. We are a family-run restaurant serving traditional specialities and authentic dishes from across China.

Cantonese-style cuisine, noodles, dim sum, and Chinese and English breakfasts.

It looks like I may have a new favourite restaurant.

— @EdibleReading

But look closer, and you’ll find this is no run-of-the-mill regional takeaway. Not so much lemon chicken as stir-fried lamb’s tripe with coriander and Dongpo-style pig shoulder.
